FdoIDataStorePropertyDictionary Class Reference

#include <IDataStorePropertyDictionary.h>

Inherits FdoIPropertyDictionary.

Inheritance diagram for FdoIDataStorePropertyDictionary:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The FdoIDataStorePropertyDictionary exposes a dictionary style interface to the datastore properties. The properties required to create or destroy a datastore can be determined and their values can be set through this interface.
